amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore a provision currently in law that bars government contractors from disclosing campaign contributions as part of the bidding process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 116-6 to restore a provision currently in law that bars government contractors from disclosing campaign contributions as part of the bidding process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 235 (Roll no. 110).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cole.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 235 (Roll no. 110).
